artist: Engraver: A.B. Duhamel; Artist: after Jean-Florentine Defraine; Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson

Cabinet des Modes

creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Trifold sheet from fashion periodical (P.15,271); woman at left in a red and black striped gown and shoes with a white fur trimmed coat and a black hat with green ribbon and bows; woman in the center in a white gown with a pink and dark purple striped overgown, a white and blue striped muff, and a white hat with red/orange ribbon and bows; two women at right shown from the waist up in elaborate hats
portfolio: From Magasin des Modes nouvelles, françaises et anglaises, Paris, 1786-89
title: Fashion plate from Magasin des Modes Nouvelles, Troisième Année, Huitième Cahier, 30 Janvier 1788
